Class ec.ifc.app.ECIconItem

Class ec.ifc.app.ECIconItem 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.ListItem
           |
           +----ec.ifc.app.ECIconItem
public class ECIconItem
extends ListItem
A subclass of ListItem that draws an image proportionally scaled to fit in the rectangle. The label is drawn below the text.

CENTERED
String display style.
LEFT_JUSTIFIED
String display style.
RIGHT_JUSTIFIED
String display style.

ECIconItem()

drawInRect(Graphics, Rect)
Draws the scaled image according to the justification, scaled to fit.
minHeight()
Returns the minimum height required to display the ListItem's title and Image, if any.
setBackgroundColor(Color)
Sets the background color
setIconJustification(int)
Sets the justification (Graphics.LEFT_JUSTIFIED, Graphics.CENTERED, Graphics.RIGHT_JUSTIFIED) the ECIconItem uses to draw its icon.
setInEditMode(boolean)
Tracks if the icon is "already being edited" and hence should not be highlighted.
setIsSwatch(boolean)
sets flag for swatch addition.
setJustification(int)
Sets the justification (Graphics.LEFT_JUSTIFIED, Graphics.CENTERED, Graphics.RIGHT_JUSTIFIED) the ECIconItem uses to draw its text.
setNumLinesInTitle(int)
Sets the number of lines that title will be limited to ATTN: more code should be here to actually enforce it!!! (=dima)
setSelectionColor(Color)
Sets the color used to highlight a selected icon.
titleHeight()
Returns the height of the title
